data.description: Open concept! Beautifully appointed! Award-winning school district! Put your own mark on the house with a GRANITE ALLOWANCE for the open-concept kitchen counters to new buyer! No HOA! A perfect opportunity to buy into close-in Kennesaw! You don't want to miss this spacious, charming, rocking-chair front porch, 3-bedroom 2-bath ranch home! Large lot in a great neighborhood. Beautifully updated with hardwood floors, designer colors, fixtures and lighting, this home sits on a nearly 3/4-acre lot in Kennesaw Acres, with a partially finished basement and two-car garage with work bench and tons of storage. Large living room with wood burning stove is an entertainer's dream, open to an eat-in kitchen with bar seating and pantry closet. Master bedroom features updated en-suite bathroom, and two additional generous-sized bedrooms share updated hall bath. Roof and hot water heater only four years old! Septic tank was serviced in February 2023. Lots of big things taken care of. This sought-after location is convenient to Kennesaw State University, I75, 575, parks, Lake Allatoona, Town Center, restaurants, shopping, award-winning schools and more!
